name: Sniper 3D Strike Assassin Game
description:
Sniper 3D Strike Assassin Game is specially designed for those gamers who love to aim with snipers fps thrilling action game with challenging missions in special sniper war to show commando skills. In Sniper 3D Strike Assassin Game, get ready to pull the trigger and eliminate the terrorists from the territory and save your friends.
Features:

- HD graphics & epic game story
- Exciting map with realistic combat environment
- Amazing Fighting Effects
- Motivational background music and sound effects
- Smooth and easy to handle control
